## Types of changes

## Maintainability & Security

- [ ] The feature is tested
- [ ] My PR complies with the security checklist

## Coding Style
- [ ] Functions are no longer than 30 lines
- [ ] Each function is only performing one task
- [ ] Files are no longer than 200 lines
